name: jest-example
description: Jest executable-stories example (file link to monorepo package)

scripts.test: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const p=require('path').resolve(process.cwd(),'../../packages/executable-stories-jest/package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.log('Skipping test: executable-stories-jest not in workspace');process.exit(0);}execSync('node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js',{stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.type-check: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const p=require('path').resolve(process.cwd(),'../../packages/executable-stories-jest/package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.log('Skipping type-check: executable-stories-jest not in workspace');process.exit(0);}execSync('pnpm --filter executable-stories-jest run build && tsc --noEmit',{stdio:'inherit'});"
